q2 module¶

class q2.TWODMAT¶

Bases: object

This class perfoms the matrix operations to given arrays.

nor_mat(arr)¶

Normalises a matrix of a given dimension MxN along its columns :param arr: matrix of shape(m,n) :type arr: numpy array :return: numpy array after manipulation :rtype: numpy array

sum_fil(arr, k)¶

Implements a sum-filter of 1-d integer array of shape (n) and kernel size k

Parameters

  • arr (numpy array matrix) – matrix of shape (m,n).

  • k ([type]) – k-top k values

Returns

int array of shape (n+k-1)

Return type

numpy array matrix

top_pos(arr, k)¶

Get the positions of top_k values of each row of a matrix of shape (m,n

Parameters

  • arr (numpy array matrix) – matrix of shape (m,n).

  • k ([type]) – k-top k values

Returns

int

Return type

numpy array matrix
